title: Bug 121687 - Exception thrown when exporting data in table inside a grid cell
OB: When trying to export data in a table that is inside a grid cell, an exception is thrown in the ReportEngineService.getMetaData() method.
EB: When exporting data in two tables, the expected result is that the data is exported successfully without any exceptions.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the application.
2. Navigate to the grid that contains a table inside a cell.
3. Try to export the data in the table.
4. Note that an exception is thrown in the ReportEngineService.getMetaData() method.
